sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNCMMNTY (CMMNTY_ID, CMMNTY_NM, CMMNTY_INTRCN, REGIST_SE_CODE, TMPLAT_ID, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) VALUES (#cmmntyId#, #cmmntyNm#, #cmmntyIntrcn#, #registSeCode#, #tmplatId#, #useAt#, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME)

INSERT INTO COMTNCMMNTYUSER (CMMNTY_ID, EMPLYR_ID, SBSCRB_DE, MNGR_AT, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) VALUES (#cmmntyId#, #emplyrId#, SYSDATETIME, #mngrAt#, #useAt#, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.CMMNTY_ID, a.CMMNTY_NM, a.USE_AT, a.REGIST_SE_CODE, c.CODE_NM as REGIST_SE_CODE_NM, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNCMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.REGIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM001'
a.CMMNTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) TB ) Z WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.CMMNTY_ID) FROM COMTNCMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.REGIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM001'
a.CMMNTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'

SELECT a.CMMNTY_ID, a.CMMNTY_NM, a.CMMNTY_INTRCN, a.USE_AT, c.TMPLAT_ID, c.TMPLAT_NM, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNCMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNTMPLATINFO c ON a.TMPLAT_ID = c.TMPLAT_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId#
SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_NM FROM COMTNBBSMASTER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNBBSUSE b ON a.BBS_ID = b.BBS_ID WHERE b.TRGET_ID = #cmmntyId# AND b.USE_AT = 'Y'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNCMMNTY SET CMMNTY_NM = #cmmntyNm#, CMMNTY_INTRCN = #cmmntyIntrcn#, TMPLAT_ID = #tmplatId#, USE_AT = #useAt#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId#
UPDATE COMTNCMMNTY SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId#

UPDATE COMTNCMMNTYUSER SET MNGR_AT = #mngrAt#, USE_AT = #useAt#, SECSN_DE = #secsnDe#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId# AND EMPLYR_ID = #emplyrId#
UPDATE COMTNCMMNTYUSER SET USE_AT = 'N', MNGR_AT = 'N', SECSN_DE = #secsnDe#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId# AND EMPLYR_ID = #emplyrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CMMNTY_ID, CMMNTY_NM, CMMNTY_INTRCN, TMPLAT_ID FROM COMTNCMMNTY WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'
SELECT a.TMPLAT_COURS FROM COMTNTMPLATINFO a, COMTNCMMNTY b WHERE a. TMPLAT_ID = b.TMPLAT_ID AND b.CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId#
SELECT COUNT(CMMNTY_ID) FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #emplyrId# AND CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId#

SELECT a.CMMNTY_ID, a.CMMNTY_NM, a.USE_AT, a.REGIST_SE_CODE, c.CODE_NM as REGIST_SE_CODE_NM, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNCMMNTY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.REGIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM001' AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY CMMNTY_NM
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNCMMNTYUSER SET USE_AT = 'N', MNGR_AT = 'N', SECSN_DE = #secsnDe#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME WHERE CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId# AND USE_AT = 'Y'
sqlMap.select: SELECT MNGR_AT, USE_AT FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #emplyrId# AND CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId#

SELECT a.EMPLYR_ID, b.USER_NM as USER_NM FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.EMPLYR_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #cmmntyId# AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.MNGR_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ASC
